test-case.name: cbcl-time-greater-than-011
test-case.description: test comparison of time
test-case.test: declare function local:time($time as xs:time, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $time }; exists(local:time(xs:time("23:58:00"), fn:true()) gt xs:time("23:58:00"))

test-case.name: cbcl-time-greater-than-012
test-case.description: test comparison of time
test-case.test: declare function local:time($time as xs:time, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $time }; local:time(xs:time("23:58:00"), fn:false()) gt xs:time("23:58:00")

test-case.name: cbcl-time-greater-than-013
test-case.description: test comparison of time
test-case.test: declare function local:time($time as xs:time, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $time }; exists(local:time(xs:time("23:58:00"), fn:true()) le xs:time("23:58:00"))

test-case.name: cbcl-time-greater-than-014
test-case.description: test comparison of time
test-case.test: declare function local:time($time as xs:time, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $time }; local:time(xs:time("23:58:00"), fn:false()) le xs:time("23:58:00")
